data.title: Ali Landry & Tori Spelling Wed!!!
data.meta_description: ~~Not each other, LOL but they both got married recently.  Ali Landry (previously married to Mario Lopez) married her longtime boyfriend Alejandro Gomez...

~~Not each other, LOL but they both got married recently. Ali Landry (previously married to Mario Lopez) married her longtime boyfriend Alejandro Gomez Monteverde. She wore a strapless Monique Lhuillier gown (Katarina)...

I have to concur with you all on the bouquet... when I first saw FG''s post I thought she was saying she LIKED them, lol. I had to go Hmmm at that. It does look like a beauty pagent arrangement, but she is otherwise lovely...

I too remember what seemed like just recently w/ her marriage to Mario Lopez so I was shaking my head at all these celebrity rebound marriages but if he cheated that''s a different story... she does look happy, let''s hope it lasts

Tori on the other hand

Joined

Jun 17, 2005

Messages

11,016

May 10, 2006

#17

Mario cheated while they were engaged, either on their honeymoon or right before the wedding. (there are No words for him).

Tori left a short marriage with no kids, but HE left a wife of 12 years and a newborn (and has other kids). I am not saying one should stay in a loveless or unhappy marriage, you get one life and there is no gain in suffering, but on the other hand, we make choices. Kids are involved, and not being happy is awful and sad, but sometimes you just hit a tough patch...I guess unless you are totally out of love, I would say try to work on it. If someone cheated, or was abusive or had problems that endangered me or my kids, that is a deal breaker. But Tori just found her soulmate, so soon after having apparently gotten married because...did she not love the first guy? DId she not think HE was her soulmate? This marriage is not one for the record books in terms of longevity, unless there is some miracle afloat...

moon river
